title: We Help Austin
description: Website where fellow Austinites can get help and help each other with a fresh take on community building.

title: Eloquent Shopping
description: Back end of an e-commerce site using Express.js API. Configured it to use Sequelize and MySQL Database.

title: PWA Budget Tracker
description: Budget Tracker using a PWA that allows users to keep track of their budget without a data/internet connection.
tech: HTML5, CSS, JavaScript, MongoDB, and Heroku

title: Society of Martha Washington
description: Website that allow students to have better access to the annual scholarship application from a non-profit organization.
tech: HTML5, CSS, JavaScript, Tailwind, jQuery, and APIs
